name: Search Taxonomy GT
author: Gabriel Tavares

sections.description: Search Taxonomy GT makes it easier for you to search for your taxonomy terms in the backend when inserting/editing posts on your wordpress website.
sections.installation: Just activate it, and you will see the input search field on edit/new post pages.
sections.faq:
Is this only for the category taxonomy?

No, it’s for every single taxonomy(including category).
sections.changelog:
1.2

Small Bug Fix

1.1

Added new functionality to keep an hierarchical structure while searching in order to not loose track of the parent terms.

1.0

  • Release

short_description: Search Taxonomy GT - This plugin adds a functionality inside the taxonomy metabox when inserting/editing posts for live taxonomy term search.
description: Search Taxonomy GT makes it easier for you to search for your taxonomy terms in the backend when inserting/editing posts on your wordpress website.
